Authors:
Samantha Fernandez-Brime, Xavier Llimona, Nestor Hladun,
Ester Gaya
Title:
First report of the pantropical species Diploschistes
rampoddensis, from Europe
Keywords:
Ascomycota, BAli-phy, lichenized-fungi, Diploschistes
scruposus, nrITS, disjunct distribution
Abstract:
The species Diploschistes rampoddensis, previously known
only from a few localities in tropical and subtropical areas of Asia and
Oceania, is reported here for the first time in Europe. A detailed
description, including macro- and microscopic characters, and remarks on
closely related taxa are also provided. Molecular analyses based on the
nrITS were used to confirm this new record for the European lichen
biota.
